request.description:
Gets a token that can be used as authorization header, using the bearer token scheme. Requires valid credentials sent. Employee Id acts as login in the context of the api.

When request is successful, returned jwt token is returned in Authorization header.

##### Request body description

| **Field** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| login | string | User's login. Must match format of 4 lower case letters, followed with 8 digits. |
| password | string | User's password. |

response.name: Invalid credentials response
Bad request response

item.name: Commands

variable.description: The id of requested command to update.

request.description:
Updates requested command with provided data. Omitted fields are not modified.  
Only admins and command's owner are authorized to make request.  
Responses with requested command's new data.

##### Request body description

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name (optional) | string | New command's name. Length must be in range from 1 to 64. Does not need to be unique. |
| body (optional) | string | New command's body, sent to a device. Length must be in range from 1 to 2048. |
| description (optional) | string | New command's description. Maximum length if 4096. |

**Note:** At least one field must be sent for request to be valid.

response.name: Successful response

variable.description: The id of requested command to update.

response.body:
{
    "id": "f86822a0-c1d7-4090-8360-58e714f0f694",
    "updatedDate": "2023-02-21T19:43:42.8999063Z",
    "body": "start -t 1000",
    "name": "New command name",
    "description": "New command's description."
}

response.name: Bad request response

request.description:
Updates requested device with provided data. Omitted fields are not modified.  
Only admins and device's owner are authorized to make requests.

Responses with requested device's new data.

##### Request body description

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name (optional) | string | New device's name. Length must be in range from 1 to 256. Does not need to be unique. |
| address (optional) | string | New device's address. Must match IPv4 address with port. |

**Note:** At least one field must be sent for request to be valid.

response.name: Bad request response
Not existing resource response

request.description:
Creates new command for requested device. Only admin and device's owner are authorized to make request.  
Responses with new command's data.

##### Request body description

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name (optional) | string | New device's name. Length must be in range from 1 to 256. Does not need to be unique. |
| address (optional) | string | New device's address. Must match IPv4 address with port. |

**Note:** At least one field must be sent for request to be valid.

response.name: Successful response

    "id": "02e1d243-b48c-4e0c-8461-df0c54732d93",
    "updatedDate": "2023-02-22T20:06:06.49017Z",
    "body": "start -t 1000",
    "name": "New device's command",
    "description": "new command"
}

request.description:
Creates new employee in the system. Only admin is authorized to make request.  
On success responses with new employee data.

##### Request body description

| **Field** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| login | string | New employee's id used as login. Must match format of 4 lower case letters, followed with 8 digits. Must be unique. |
| name | string | New employee's name. |
| password | string | New employee's password. Must contain at least 1 lower case letter, 1 upper case letter, 1 digit. Length must be in range from 8 to 32. No special characters allowed. |

response.name: Successful response
response.body:
{
    "id": "a843d8d3-d9c3-4279-a2b2-15b99b8c3d60",
    "name": "new employee",
    "employeeId": "xxaa11113333",
    "updatedDate": "2023-02-22T21:00:35.3264387Z",
    "enabled": true
}

response.name: Employee Id taken response
Bad request response

request.description:
Updates requested employee in the system. Only admin is authorized to make request.  
On success responses with employee new data.

##### Request body description

| **Field** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| login (optional) | string | Employee's new id used as login. Must match format of 4 lower case letters, followed with 8 digits. Must be unique. |
| name (optional) | string | Employee's new name. |
| password (optional) | string | Employee's new password. Must contain at least 1 lower case letter, 1 upper case letter, 1 digit. Length must be in range from 8 to 32. No special characters allowed. |

**Note:** At least one field must be provided for request to be valid.

response.name: Successful response
response.body:
{
    "id": "a843d8d3-d9c3-4279-a2b2-15b99b8c3d60",
    "name": "new employee",
    "employeeId": "yyaa11113333",
    "updatedDate": "2023-02-22T21:06:21.4476911Z",
    "enabled": true
}

response.name: Employee Id taken response
